statements: SELECT * FROM fashion_events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM fashion_events WHERE location = 'Paris';
SELECT event_id, location, guest_list FROM fashion_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fashion_events WHERE event_name LIKE '%Fashion Week%';
SELECT event_id, event_date, JSON_VALUE(runway_looks, '$.designer') AS designer FROM fashion_events;
SELECT event_name, location, event_date FROM fashion_events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location, guest_list FROM fashion_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_events WHERE event_name LIKE '%Summer%';
SELECT event_name, JSON_VALUE(runway_looks, '$.designer') AS designer FROM fashion_events WHERE JSON_VALUE(runway_looks, '$.theme') = 'Glamorous';
SELECT event_name, location, JSON_QUERY(runway_looks, '$.[*].outfit') AS outfits FROM fashion_events WHERE JSON_ARRAY_LENGTH(runway_looks) > 3 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_show_schedule;
SELECT show_name, show_location, show_date FROM fashion_show_schedule;
SELECT * FROM guest_list WHERE guest_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM guest_list ORDER BY guest_name DESC;
SELECT show_name, show_location FROM fashion_show_schedule WHERE show_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fashion_show_schedule WHERE show_location = 'Paris';
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, show_name FROM guest_list JOIN fashion_show_schedule ON guest_list.show_id = fashion_show_schedule.show_id;
SELECT show_name, show_date, show_location FROM fashion_show_schedule WHERE show_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, show_date FROM guest_list JOIN fashion_show_schedule ON guest_list.show_id = fashion_show_schedule.show_id ORDER BY show_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT show_location FROM fashion_show_schedule;
SELECT * FROM fashion_show_schedule;
SELECT show_id, event_date, venue FROM fashion_show_schedule ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM guest_list WHERE guest_category='VIP';
SELECT show_id, designer_name, venue FROM fashion_show_schedule WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT designer_id FROM runway_looks;
SELECT * FROM runway_looks WHERE designer_id = 1 ORDER BY outfit_price DESC;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM guest_list WHERE guest_category = 'VIP' LIMIT 10;
SELECT show_id, event_date, venue FROM fashion_show_schedule ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT designer_name, outfit_description, outfit_price FROM fashion_show_schedule JOIN runway_looks ON fashion_show_schedule.show_id = runway_looks.show_id WHERE designer_name = 'Chanel';
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, guest_category FROM guest_list ORDER BY guest_category, guest_name;
SELECT * FROM fashion_show_schedule;
SELECT show_location, show_date FROM fashion_show_schedule ORDER BY show_date DESC;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email, guest_type FROM guest_list WHERE guest_type = 'VIP';
SELECT designer_name, look_description FROM runway_looks WHERE look_id IN ('c2d00678-6eb0-45c3-a60e-3c037117a95b', 'a2be78c6-43e9-4fc0-8e9f-2aeb64f2e0b9');
SELECT review_id, rating, review_comment FROM event_reviews WHERE show_id = '930b0854-d94b-4795-98d4-4b0e89e4b208' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_show_schedule;
SELECT show_id, show_date FROM fashion_show_schedule ORDER BY show_date DESC;
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM guest_list WHERE guest_type = 'VIP';
SELECT look_description, designer_name FROM runway_looks WHERE designer_name LIKE 'Chanel%';
SELECT review_id, rating, review_comment FROM event_reviews ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_show_schedule ORDER BY show_date DESC;
SELECT designer_name, show_location FROM fashion_show_schedule WHERE show_location='Paris';
SELECT * FROM guest_list WHERE show_attending IN (SELECT show_id FROM fashion_show_schedule WHERE show_date >= '2022-01-01' AND show_date <= '2022-12-31');
SELECT model_name, outfit_description FROM runway_looks WHERE designer_name='Chanel';
SELECT event_name, event_date, venue_location FROM fashion_events WHERE event_type='Fashion Show' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_show_schedule WHERE show_location='Paris';
SELECT guest_name, guest_email FROM guest_list WHERE show_attending='8d0a1e7e-5894-4e23-94fc-569a5d6a5b1d';
SELECT DISTINCT designer_name FROM runway_looks ORDER BY designer_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, venue_location, event_type FROM fashion_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' AND event_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_role, event_id FROM event_guests WHERE guest_id='aae1ecbc-74e8-44d0-80a5-f484f2b284c7';
